message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I think we can do better than that, Alice.  Let's split it 55/45. It's a fairer deal for both of us.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to take a little less, but I need you to be more reasonable. Time is running out!
Alice, let's be realistic. We need to come to an agreement soon. I'm willing to take 45, but we both need to be flexible to avoid losing everything.
